title: Chicken puff pastry roll with mushroom sauce
ingredients: ['1 pack puff pastry, thawed if frozen', '1 pound minced chicken', '4 tablespoons water', '1 onion, grated', '2 eggs', 'salt to taste', 'ground black pepper to taste', '60g dry breadcrumbs', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', 'Mushroom sauce', '30g butter', '2 tablespoons plain flour', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', '1/2 packet dried onion soup mix', '1 small tin mushrooms, drained', '250ml water', '2 tablespoons white wine']
